alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 1:39AM MST until February 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Expect snow showers to develop from west to east during the day Sunday. Snow levels will initially be above 6500 feet early Sunday morning, but will quickly fall. Patchy blowing and drifting snow is also possible, with southwest winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Eagar-Springerville, Ganado, Kayenta, Pinetop- Lakeside, Saint Johns, Show Low and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 6 AM Today to 6 PM Today: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Buffalo Pass 1 to 3 inches Chinle 0 to 1 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 2 inches Ganado 1 to 3 inches Kayenta 0 to 1 inches Pinetop-Lkside 4 to 6 inches Saint Johns 0 to 1 inches Show Low 3 to 5 inches Window Rock 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
